prodNameC: 貝克曼庫爾特IO檢測CD2 單株抗體
prodNameE: Beckman Coulter IOTest CD2 monoclonal antibody
ingredientsDesc:
Specifications
Specificity 	CD2
Clone	39C1.5
Hybridoma	P3-X63-Ag.8.653 x rat spleen cells
Immunogen	PHA stimulated human lymphoblasts
Immunoglobulin	IgG2a
Species	Rat
Source	Ascites
Purification	Ion exchange chromatography
Fluorochrome	FITC	PE	PC5	PC7
λ excitation	488 nm	488 nm	488 nm	488 nm
Emission	525 nm	575 nm	670 nm	770 nm
Buffer	PBS pH 7.2 plus 2 mg / BSA and 0.1% NaN3
applicantName: 美商貝克曼庫爾特有限公司台灣分公司
applicantAddr: 台北市大安區敦化南路二段216號8樓
efficacy: 這個螢光標定的抗體允許使用流式細胞儀鑑定及計算人類生物性檢體中表現CD2抗原的細胞族群。
mdFormat: CD2-FITC(A07743):2ml,100 tests/vial; CD2-PE(A07744): 2ml,100 tests/vial; CD2-PC5(A07745): 1ml, 100 tests/vial; CD2-PC7(A21689): 1ml, 100 tests/vial

mdKind.mdKindMCodeName: B 血液學及病理學裝置
mdKind.mdKindDCodeName: B.5220 自動區別細胞計數器

factoryDtoList.factoryName: IMMUNOTECH SAS, A BECKMAN COULTER COMPANY
factoryDtoList.factoryAddr: 130.AVENUE DE LATTRE DE TASSIGNY-BP177-13276 MARSEILLE CEDEX 9-FRANCE
